body.text:
Thanks for joining us. Here are a couple of great ways to get started:

|  |  |  |   
---  
|  |  |  Welcome!   
---  
      
    
    Thanks for joining us. Here are a couple of great ways to get started:  
  
|  |  |  |  Azure DevOps   
---  
Collaborate in the cloud with version control, agile, continuous delivery, app
analytics - using any IDE or editor.  
|  |  Start your project  |  |  Learn more   
---|---|---  
|  |  Visual Studio Dev Essentials   
---  
Get everything you need to build and deploy your app on any platform. With
state-of-the-art tools, the power of the cloud, training, and support, it's
our most comprehensive free developer program ever.  
|  |  Access your benefits  |  |  Learn more   
---|---|---  
|  |  Profile details   
---  
|  |  Your sign-in address  |  kevinrlinze@gmail.com  
---|---|---  
|  Your preferred email  |  kevinrlinze@gmail.com  
|  Review preferences  |  Your preferences  
|  Review your details  |  See your personal page  
|  Need help?  |  Check out our support options  
|  これは、Azure DevOps からの必須のサービス通信です。  
---  
Microsoft はプライバシーを尊重しています。オンライン サービスのプライバシーに関する声明をご確認ください。  
One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA, USA 98052。
